Thank You for Choosing Direct Energy Solar and Nest
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Friend}},
Thank you for choosing Direct Energy Solar for your solar installation. We are honored that you have selected us. Your solar-powered home can be even more energy-efficient with the Nest Learning Thermostat™ you’ll soon receive with our compliments. It will be mailed 30 days from the date you signed your contract*. Thermostats control half of your home’s energy. Teach Nest well and you could save up to 20% on your energy bill.
We truly appreciate your business and hope that you are as excited as we are about your upcoming solar installation.
Nest Support
While Direct Energy Solar cannot install your Nest, Nest Support <http://nest.com/support/thermostat> has a wealth of information.
If you’re comfortable changing a light fixture, you can install Nest. Most people install the Nest Thermostat themselves in 30 minutes or less.
Watch the Nest installation video, quickly solve problems, or get help from a pro. Check out nest.com/support/thermostat <http://nest.com/support/thermostat>.
Contact Us: 800-903-6130 Your Sun. Your Power. Your Way.
You’re receiving this email because you’ve expressed interest in a Direct Energy Solar system installation.
*Offer valid for qualifying homes that sign a new solar system contract with Direct Energy Solar between July 16, 2015–August 15, 2015. No extensions will be granted. Your Nest Thermostat will be mailed 30 days after your contract signing. Direct Energy Solar is not responsible for installing your Nest Thermostat. Minimum system size is 4 kW. Qualifying homes must be located in a territory that Direct Energy Solar serves. Offer not valid with any other promotions, discounts, or special community pricing programs. Only one discount offer per household. Nest®, Nest Learning Thermostat™, Nest Leaf™, Airwave™, Auto-Away™ and the Nest logo are trademarks or servicemarks of Nest Labs, Inc.
Offers and financing are not available in all areas. We customize our solar power system specifically for your home, therefore, pricing, savings, utility bill, solar bill amounts and actual returns vary based on different factors including but not limited to your location, system size, available solar incentives and local utility rates. See terms and conditions for more details.
